title: ICE "token_lit in from_mac_args: InvalidIntSuffix"

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust #[a=5z] ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'token_lit in from_mac_args: InvalidIntSuffix', compiler/rustc_ast/src/attr/mod.rs:622:63 ```

### Regression Regression in nightly-2022-11-18 from bebd57a9602e48431c90274fbf7d96683b0708b6 (#102944) ### Version ``` rustc 1.67.0-nightly (b833ad56f 2022-11-18) binary: rustc commit-hash: b833ad56f46a0bbe0e8729512812a161e7dae28a commit-date: 2022-11-18 host: x86_64-apple-darwin release: 1.67.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.4 ```
